@codres - 1.85 is always cropped from fullscreen - it is not a true anamorphic format like Cinemascope. It is, however, *meant* to be cropped when shown. An anamorphic (as the term is applied to DVDs) transfer of a cropped film to DVD would give you significantly higher resolution on a widescreen TV. So, by all means, download this one if it is indeed anamorphic, or download it anyway because it's an excellent film.
I downloaded it and the nfo is *wrong*. It is *not* anamorphic. FFA reads erroneous info from the back of the DVD boxes and puts it in their nfo - which is hardly impressive.
